description: This file is a header file for the breakpad wrapper in the RDK project, declaring functions related to crash reporting and memory mapping.

methods.name: breakpad_AddMappingInfo
methods.description: Adds memory mapping information to the breakpad crash handler, including module name, identifier, start address, size, and file offset.

methods.name: breakpad_ExceptionHandler
methods.description: Sets up or triggers the breakpad exception handler.

methods.name: breakpad_autoconstruct
methods.description: Automatically constructs or initializes breakpad components at startup.
